publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3148# Miss Annabel Goldie: Paisley Choral Festival—That the Parliament notes the recent launch by Voices in Paisley of the Paisley Choral Festival to be held between 30 September and 15 October 2005; congratulates the organisers on their commitment and vision; acknowledges the valuable support and encouragement given by Renfrewshire Council and other local bodies and organisations, and commends this initiative, not only for both harnessing and nurturing musical ability within the area, but also for being a contributor to the wider economic, social and cultural regeneration of Paisley. Supported by: Murray Tosh*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Murdo Fraser*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr David Davidson*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3148# Paisley Choral Festival (lodged on 9 August 2005) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bill Aitken*, Phil Gallie*, John Scott*

S2M-3148# Miss Annabel Goldie: Paisley Choral Festival—That the Parliament notes the recent launch by Voices in Paisley of the Paisley Choral Festival to be held between 30 September and 15 October 2005; congratulates the organisers on their commitment and vision; acknowledges the valuable support and encouragement given by Renfrewshire Council and other local bodies and organisations, and commends this initiative, not only for both harnessing and nurturing musical ability within the area, but also for being a contributor to the wider economic, social and cultural regeneration of Paisley.Supported by: Murray Tosh, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Ms Wendy Alexander, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Murdo Fraser, Bruce Crawford, Mr David Davidson, Eleanor Scott, Mrs Nanette Milne, Bill Aitken, Phil Gallie, John Scott, Mr Brian Monteith*, Tricia Marwick*
